name: Japanese Cats in Paintings
description:
Let's collect the cats in Japanese paintings!
This is the cat collection game without charge.

● Summon 205 cats in the 41 paintings!

● The summoned cat will gather at "the Cat House".
Tap to collect money and items!

● if you collect money, then summon a new cat!
Let's aim at the completion of all 205 cats!

-------------

◆ A casual game of simple operation.
You can collect chillin between whiles!

◆ 205 cute cats!

◆ 41 famous japanese paintings of the Edo era (almost 1800s)

◆ completely free

-------------
Artists Name
-------------
Kuniyoshi Utagawa
Hiroshige Utagawa
Yoshifuji Utagawa
... and more
